name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Detail-oriented Senior QA Engineer with 13+ years of experience in software testing and quality assurance processes. Skilled in manual testing, API testing, and utilizing tools such as **Postman** and **Swagger** for effective test management. Proficient in **Jira** for tracking defects and facilitating communication across teams. Equipped with a strong understanding of QA processes and methodologies to deliver high-quality software in compliance-driven environments. 
Additionally, I possess full-stack development experience in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside a solid foundation in both frontend and backend frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Django**. I've contributed to building AI/ML-powered applications for predictive analytics and have expertise in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, further enhancing the robustness of software solutions.
